title: Project Ideas
content:
# Side Project Ideas

## 1. CLI Budget Tracker
Simple terminal app for tracking expenses
- SQLite for storage
- Rich tables for display
- CSV export

## 2. Markdown Blog Generator
Static site generator focused on simplicity
- YAML frontmatter
- Code syntax highlighting
- RSS feed generation

## 3. Git Hooks Manager
Tool for managing pre-commit hooks across projects

title: Quick Reference
content:
# Useful Commands

## Docker
```bash
docker system prune -a  # Clean up
docker stats            # Resource usage
```

## Git
```bash
git log --oneline -10   # Recent commits
git diff --staged       # Staged changes
```

## Python
```bash
python -m venv .venv    # Create venv
pip freeze > reqs.txt   # Export deps
```
